hero.title: WhatsApp AI Assistants
hero.subtitle: Sell more and support 24/7. Capture, qualify and schedule via WhatsApp with AI connected to your CRM and campaigns.

pitch.subtitle_long: We implement conversational assistants connected to your CRM, calendar and catalogs to capture, qualify, nurture and convert 24/7 on WhatsApp: more bookings, more closes and support without wait times.
sales_focus: Close more: proactive follow‑up and recovery of conversations that went cold.
Campaigns that convert: integrate your ads and segment answers by source (UTM).
Support that scales: triage, resolve FAQs and route only the complex cases.
Explore products and plans: guide each person to the right option with catalog and pricing.

definition.what_is: A WhatsApp conversational assistant, powered by AI and connected to your systems (CRM, calendar, catalogs and campaigns), that replies in seconds, qualifies leads, books appointments, answers FAQs and re‑engages cold chats to maximize closes.
key_benefits: Automatic qualification and routing to the right rep.
Integrated scheduling to reduce friction and no‑shows.
Full CRM logging for real reports and attribution.
Cold lead recovery and nurturing without extra team effort.

pains: Leads ask ‘is it available?’ but don't get a timely reply.
Conversations go cold: nobody follows up and the sale is lost.
Reps answering the same questions instead of closing.
WhatsApp data not logged in the CRM: incomplete reports.
Support overloaded with basic questions a bot can handle.
deliverables: WhatsApp assistant with qualification, nurturing and booking flows.
Automatic lead recovery: re‑engage cold chats with value.
CRM and campaigns integration: pipelines, owners, UTM and events.
Knowledge base (FAQ + URLs/PDFs) for precise answers.
Metrics dashboard: conversations, bookings, conversions and drop‑off reasons.
Team training + ops manual + 30/60/90 day improvements.

steps.title: Commercial discovery
steps.desc: Goals, KPIs and tone; map pains and objections.

steps.title: Integration
steps.desc: Meta Cloud/Twilio, CRM (stages/owners), calendar and catalogs.

steps.title: Content & training

steps.desc: Controlled tests + re‑engagement of cold conversations.

steps.title: Rollout & optimization
steps.desc: 24/7, dashboards and improvements focused on closing.

faqs.q: Do I need WhatsApp Business API?
faqs.a: Yes. We'll help you run on Meta Cloud API or your provider (e.g., Twilio) for templates and reliable delivery.
A functional pilot in 2–3 weeks; full rollout depends on integrations, usually 3–6 weeks.
We define KPIs (bookings, closes, time saved) and build weekly reports from CRM data.

faqs.q: Can it answer from my docs?
faqs.a: Yes. We index FAQs, URLs and PDFs for contextual answers (RAG) with tone control.
We respect WhatsApp opt‑in and apply roles, audit and deletion on request.
